newsArray.title: Jodhamal School holds Annual Sports Day
newsArray.description: Excelsior Sports Correspondent JAMMU, Dec 8: Jodhamal Public School celebrated its 20th Annual Sports Day 2025 with immense zeal and camaraderie on the school campus. A spectacular and well-coordinated march past by the NCC Naval and Army wing cadets left the audience captivated. A series of track and field events formed the core of the day’s festivities. Students participated in large numbers in the 100m, 200m, 400m races, along with 4x100m and 4x200m relay events, drawing constant applause from spectators. [...]The post Jodhamal School holds Annual Sports Day appeared first on Daily Excelsior.
creator: Daily Excelsior
